GeneDef.label: abysmal entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Due to some weird genetic manipulation of the carrier's brain, they find themselves almost incapable of dealing any notable damage to entity targets.

GeneDef.label: extremely bad entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have significant difficulty killing other entities, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take the lives of entities, or just general inexplicable physical incapability not yet explained by science.

GeneDef.label: very bad entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have major issues when trying to kill other entities, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take the lives of entities, or just general inexplicable physical incapability not yet explained by science.

GeneDef.label: bad entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues when trying to kill other entities, either because of a special wiring in their brains to not take the lives of entities, or just general inexplicable physical incapability not yet explained by science.

GeneDef.label: somewhat good entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know some of the weak points of any entity they fight, making it easier to kill them.

GeneDef.label: good entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know a lot of the weak points of any entity they fight, making it easier to kill them.

GeneDef.label: very good entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know most of the weak points of any entity they fight, making it easier to kill them.

GeneDef.label: extremely good entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know every weak point of any entity they fight, making it significantly easier to kill them.

GeneDef.label: unbelievably good entity slayer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know every weak point of any entity they fight and have the ability to predict where the entity will move next with a low accuracy rate, making it significantly easier to kill them.\n\nAlite's note: Predictive ability doesn't really exist or do anything, it's just some fluff text that I use to be able to claim this gene makes complete sense.
